attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded the app so that I could keep up with my president to some degree. And my phone would over heat because I was getting to many notifications I tried to turn them off but it would not let me one thing lead to another and my phone got so ridiculously hot that it melted and turned into lava in my back pocket now my bum bum has 3rd degree burn marks because of the app DO NOT recommend

attributes.title: All Hail the Chief
attributes.review: I am in full support of our benevolent dictator and savior trump.  Long may he reign!  His large hands and stable genius are renown throughout the world.  His work to drain the swamp must continue!  Trump 2024 and beyond!  Unfortunately, this app does not live up to his bigly greatness.  While our fearless leader has all the smartest people in his staff, this raw talent clearly does not extend to the creators of this app.  Captain my captain:  you need an app befitting your greatness!  Sad.

attributes.title: Keeps signing me out
attributes.review: This app hardly works. maybe trump should of invested more in this app. Any ways, there is a ton of bugs with this app. I tried signing in, but it keeps loading, then exits back to the login screen. How am I supposed to keep up to date with great america when my beautiful peach president can't run an app? Its disapointing really, I am going to have to prolong my worship, until this app is fixed.
